text: And Urias said to David, The ark, and Israel, and Juda dwell in tents; and my lord Joab, and the servants of my lord, 11. 11 Lit. encamp.are encamped in the open fields; and shall I go into my house to eat and drink, and lie with my wife? how should I do this? as thy soul lives, 11. 11 Gr. if I do this thing.I will not do this thing.
